sentences.sContent: Pear trees are grafted on quince rootstocks.
sentences.sCn: 梨树被嫁接到榅桲的根茎上。

synos.tran: [外科][生物]移植；[农学]嫁接；[法]贪污
[外科][生物]移植；[农学]嫁接；[法]贪污
[外科][生物]移植；[农学]嫁接；赎职

phrases.pCn: 植皮手术，皮肤移植术；移植的皮肤

remMethod.val: g(看作go) + raft(木筏) → 用木筏运送嫁接的树苗 → 嫁接

words.tran: [农学] 嫁接；接合；接受移植（graft的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to join a part of a plant or tree onto another plant or tree

trans.tranCn: 嫁接， 结合； 贪污
trans.tranOther: a piece cut from one plant and tied to or put inside a cut in another, so that it grows there
